publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5461 Mary Scanlon: The National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010 (SSI 2010/1).

S3M-5461 Mary Scanlon: The National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010 (SSI 2010/1).
